name: VR Sniper XXX 3D: Shooting in Zombie Town
name_original: VR Sniper XXX 3D: Shooting in Zombie Town
description:
Unleash your killer instinct and blow off some zombie heads with your sniper gun in this VR shooter game.

Note: This is a VR game and is played with a VR headset.

This is an island full of dead zombies walking everywhere. An ultimate gory horror environment and you’re the only man alive. There is only one rule on this dead island – “shoot to kill”. Take a role of an assassin with your sniper rifle. Be the ultimate sniper and bring out your killer instinct to blow off zombie heads. Blast those walking beasts in the head to make them dead in one shot. Every shot counts!

FEATURES :
- 3D FPS style controls.
- Extreme horror environment and gory body splatting animations.
- Zombie body exploding effects.

If you love sniper scope games then hit the download button now and enjoy!
